alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, southeastern St. Johns and east central Putnam Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from San Mateo to near Barberville. Movement was northeast near 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Hastings, East Palatka, Andalusia, Saint Augustine Beach and Marineland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
